level.heading: Abatement of real property taxes for 4427 Hayes Street, N.E.
level.text: The real property described as Lot 120, Square 5129, and any improvements thereon, shall be exempt from the tax imposed by Chapter 8 of this title during tax years 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, and 2015; provided, that the total tax exemption provided by this section shall not exceed $140,000.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of ยง 47-4649, see ยง 722(b) of Fiscal Year 2011 Supplemental Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-694, January 19, 2011, 58 DCR 662).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-370, see notes under ยง 47-143.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 721 of D.C. Law 18-370 provided that subtitle C of title VII of the act may be cited as "4427 Hayes Street, N.E., Real Property Tax Abatement Act of 2010".
